name: La Veranda Italian Restaurant at Sheraton Hotel

reviews.title: Good, but tired
reviews.text: Great location, buffet food is pretty average. Whole venue is really tired.

reviews.title: Nice and peaceful with good quality food
reviews.text: La Veranda is a lovely place to dine as the atmosphere is so relaxed and the food provided at the buffet and the cooking station is fresh and tasty.

reviews.title: Restaurant located within the Sheraton Hotel, but do not expect too much
reviews.text: I was guest of the Sheraton Hotel a couple of times and this is by far the hotel I prefer in Doha. Unfortunately La Veranda cannot be rated in the same way. I had one brunch and one dinner over there, and did not find anything to impress me, on the other hand, was both times quite disappointed. There is a huge turn over of personnel in Doha hotels, so I guess that things will get better when they will change the people currently taking care of the restaurant. Last note: yes, Italian restaurant...but not really that much. Not extremely expensive.

reviews.text: They have a beautiful veranda, but the food is ho-humm and if you have to sit inside, it really lacks charm.

reviews.title: Not quite Italian, but good enough
reviews.text: I am not too sure the chef is/was Italian, but the menu had a few dishes that were not properly Italian. Also the food did not taste it like mama used to make :) but overall the quality is not that bad.

reviews.title: Great food. as in any other Italian restaurant
reviews.text: Service great and food just as good as in the best italians around the world

reviews.title: THE BEST
reviews.text: wow this restaraunt it just amazing! We left my daughter and her freinds to eat there and spend time together. So we ordered pizza for them and left. My daughter said she really enjoyed the pizza AND the waitors let her+her freinds go 3 times in the salad bar for FREE she really enjoyed that! The waitors/watresess were really nice to the kids.

reviews.title: Best location for dinner
reviews.text: Fantastic Italian atmosphere, sitting in the garden in this nice weather is just great. Very nice food, the salad buffet is amazing. My wife loved the place. I think this is one of the best choices for dinner in Doha.
We went here to celebrate my husband's birthday with family. The location is amazing looking out over the bay of Doha. We were able to sit outside and make the most of the wonderful setting.
reviews.title: Wonderful location
Try the lunch buffet!
reviews.text: Good Italian food. The lunch buffet is excellent and the view over the bay is very nice.

reviews.title: Disappointing food
reviews.text: The location is stunning, with a great view of the Corniche and the skyscrapers behind. Service was good, the maître d' very welcoming and it certainly had a good feel as we walked in.

The food we had was simply very disappointing, everything was overcooked and not tasty at all. A stray cat wandered by and showed little interest in the food, we joked that she had obviously eaten here before!
reviews.title: Nice for weekends
Good Italian food
reviews.text: Having said that, the pizzas actually looked pretty good, so whilst our food was really all quite poor, if you fancy a pizza with a great view it might not be a disaster.
The wine list was very expensive (for better wines) - I seem to recall that a 'not a special year' Dom Perignon was £600, which even by Doha standards is a bit steep.
reviews.title: Awful food and awful surroundings
